bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum, fully butted, women's recreational geometry and tubesets, double ORE DT, externally relieved HT, forged dropouts w/ replaceable alloy hanger

components.description: SR Suntour XCT (SF11-XCT-V3-DS-26), 1pc. alloy lower, 28mm Hi-Ten stanchions, custom women's coil/mcu spring w/ preload adj., 80mm travel
Tektro Novela mechanical disc brake, dual pad angle adj., post mount, 160mm rotor
Tektro Novela mechanical disc brake, dual pad angle adj., post mount, 160mm rotor
Tektro, die cast lever, included w/ brake
SR Suntour XCT, 8-speed, square taper spindle
Sealed cartridge, square taper, double crank stop, 68x118mm
Composite platform w/ molded pins, toe clip compatible, 9/16" w/ reflectors
Alex HR Disc 26", alloy double-wall, disc, pin joint, 24mm, 32h
Disc hub, QR axle, sealed loose ball, 17mm contact, 32h
Specialized Fast Trak LK Sport, 60 TPI, wire bead, 26x2.0"
Specialized Fast Trak LK Sport, 60 TPI, wire bead, 26x2.0"
Alloy, 2 bolt head, 30.9mm, 12.5mm offset, micro adjust
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
